title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to talk with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM, embedder, and tool-calling wrappers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Clean open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that plugs into any local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home-Assistant custom component exposing Ollama models as conversation agents.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Feature-rich interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with history, snippets, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension turning Ollama models into a free local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop app (Rust+React) for chatting with Ollama without a browser.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library wrapping Ollama’s REST endpoints for JVM projects.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for integrating Ollama into Rails or scripts.

title: ollama discord bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for private LLM tests.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# SDK (.NET 6+) for Ollama with async enumerable streaming support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: PyPI landing page for the official ollama Python package (mirror of ollama-python repo).

title: npm ollama
summary: NPM registry page for the official ollama JavaScript package (mirror of ollama-js repo).

title: r/ollama - Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tips, model tweaks, and integrations around Ollama.

title: Ollama on Hacker News
summary: Discussion thread covering performance benchmarks and production usage of Ollama.
